act_info.full_title: Deaf-Blind Awareness Month Act, 2000, S.O. 2000, c. 34
act_info.citation: Deaf-Blind Awareness Month Act, 2000, S.O. 2000, c. 34

content.content: 1. The month of June in each year is proclaimed as Deaf-Blind Awareness Month.  2000, c. 34, s. 1. 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).  2000, c. 34, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  2000, c. 34, s. 3. ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1. The month of June in each year is proclaimed as Deaf-Blind Awareness Month.  2000, c. 34, s. 1.

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).  2000, c. 34, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  2000, c. 34, s. 3.

______________

 

Français
